animal.question: I say 'Meow', and I like to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I love playing with yarn.
🐈 I am a small, furry pet.

animal.question: I go 'Woof, woof!' and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like playing fetch.
🐕 I am a furry friend that loves to go on walks.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I like to eat seeds.
💛 I am often yellow when I'm little.
🦆 I have webbed feet to help me swim.

animal.question: I say 'Moo' and give you milk. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat grass in the field.
⚫ I can have black and white spots.
🐄 I am a big animal that lives on a farm.

animal.question: I oink and roll in the mud. What am I?

hints.text: 🐽 I have a snout.
🩷 I am often pink.
🐖 I live on a farm and like to eat lots of food.

animal.question: I say 'Baa' and have fluffy wool. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ My coat helps people stay warm.
🐑 I like to graze on hillsides.
🌿 I eat grass and live on farms.

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat carrots.
🐇 I like to dig in the ground.
🐾 I have long hind legs for jumping.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🐘 I live in Africa and Asia.
💧 I use my trunk to drink water.

animal.question: I have a long neck and eat leaves from tall trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest animal.
🌿 I love to eat acacia leaves.
🐆 I have a patterned coat

animal.question: I roar and am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a big mane.
🦁 I am a very strong cat.
🐾 I hunt other animals for food.

weather.question: I fall from the sky. You need an umbrella! What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am wet!
🌧️ I come from clouds.
☔ You don't want to get wet from me!

weather.question: I am big and yellow and hot. I come out during the day! What am I?

hints.text: 🔆 I shine brightly.
🔥 I can make you feel warm.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and float in the sky! What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I look like sheep.
☁️ I can bring rain.
🌬️ I move with the wind.

weather.question: I am cold and white and fall from the sky in the winter! What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am very chilly.
⛄ You can build a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when I fall.

weather.question: I make the leaves dance and blow your hat off! What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I can be gentle or strong.
🌬️ I am moving air.
🪁 You can fly a kite with me.

weather.question: I come after the rain and have lots of colors! What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I am curved.
✨ I appear when the sun shines through the rain.
🎨 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet!

weather.question: Sometimes I am very loud and bright in the sky during a storm! What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am electricity in the sky.
⛈️ I come with thunder.
🙈 I can be scary.

weather.question: I am a loud rumbling sound that comes after lightning. What am I?

hints.text: 🔊 I am a big boom.
⛈️ I come during a storm.
👂 You can hear me, but not see me.

weather.question: When the sun shines, sometimes the water turns into me. I look like smoke! What am I?

hints.text: 🌫️ I can make it hard to see.
☁️ I am made of tiny water droplets in the air.
🚗 Be careful driving through me!

weather.question: Sometimes the rain freezes and turns into these. They bounce when they fall! What are they?

hints.text: 🧊 They are hard like ice.
🤕 They can hurt if they hit you!
🌨️ They can fall during thunderstorms.
